mapper.select: select LIMIT_ID as id, CERT_NO as certNo, ID_NO as idNo,STATUS as status, TYPE as type from t_limitation l where l.id_no=#{idno} and l.cert_no = #{certno} and l.status = 1 and (l.due_time is null or l.due_Time > sysdate)

select ID_NO as idNo, ID_TYPE as idType, CERT_NO as certNo, IN_HISTORY as inHistory, ENROLL_NUM as enrollNum, PROVINCE as province, CITY_ID as city, ORG_ID as org from t_enrollment where cert_no = #{idno} and id_no = #{certno}

select REG_ID as id, NAME as name, ID_NO as idNo, ID_TYPE as idTypeName, CERT_NO as certNo, SEX as sexName, BIRTHDAY as birthday, NATION as nationName, CT_ID as certTypeName, SUBJECT as subject, ORG_NAME as orgName, DELETE_STATUS as deleteStatus from t_history_valid where cert_no = #{idno} and id_no = #{certno}

select NAME as name, ID_NO as idNo, ID_TYPE as idTypeName, CERT_NO as certNo, SEX as sexName, BIRTHDAY as birthday, NATION as nationName, CT_ID as certTypeName, SUBJECT as subjectName, ORG_NAME as orgName from t_registration where cert_no = #{idno} and id_no = #{certno}
